com.linkedin.parseq

Interface DelayedExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelayedExecutorAdapter

    public interface DelayedExecutor
    An object that allows a task to be scheduled for execution after some delay.
    Author:
    Chris Pettitt (cpettitt@linkedin.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cancellable schedule(long delay, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit, java.lang.Runnable command)
      Schedules a command to execute after some period of delay.

    • Method Detail

      • schedule

        Cancellable schedule(long delay,
                     java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit,
                     java.lang.Runnable command)
        Schedules a command to execute after some period of delay.
        Parameters:
        delay - the amount of time to wait before executing the command
        unit - the time unit for the delay parameter
        command - the command to execute
        Returns:
        a handle that can be used to cancel a future if it has not already run.
